title: Devil May Cry 2001
description:
To be able to run this game, you need to download the PS2 Emulator. It's 100% working, and you don't need to do any survey crap to download it. I put it there myself, so I know what I'm saying :P 


Then you open up the file PCX2 1.0.0, click on CDVD and make sure that the Iso plugin is selected. Then you click on System and select either one of the first options.
